queryName: Group With Privilege Escalation By Actions 'iam:UpdateAssumeRolePolicy' And 'sts:AssumeRole'
descriptionText: Group with privilege escalation by actions 'iam:UpdateAssumeRolePolicy' and 'sts:AssumeRole' and Resource set to '*'. For more information see https://rhinosecuritylabs.com/aws/aws-privilege-escalation-methods-mitigation/.
